\n
Requirement gathering & business analysis to design and prepare business solution for the inventory data and associated financials/cost to the organization in each stage throughout supply chain process.
\n
Developing the desktop graphical user interface applications using the Python Scripting Software to map the manufacturing unit to customer utilization.
\n
Developing best practices, to add/remove products, customers, warehouses, financial systems mapping to understand the impact of the process duplications.
\n
Utilize specialized scripting tools to produce the algorithms with help of development teams to get the desired outcome for the Inventory tracking & Financial implications.
\n
Design & create complex data model and add integration feasibility to produce the reports for business to take quality decisions.
\n
Work as liaison between senior managements and technical teams to provide the requirements strategy to bring the financial impacts.
\n
Responsible for troubleshooting, optimizing performance and resolving day to day by connecting users with right outcomes.
